posts.post_content: Excellent card a [Scathe Zombie](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scathe Zombie ) generator that targets *both* graveyards. Also another great addition to the Zombie beats play style and backed with [Death Baron,](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Baron,) [Lord of the Undead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of the Undead), and [Undead Warchief](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Warchief ) you have a fast and furious Zombie deck that can hold it own against almost any deck. Combine with [Zombie Master](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zombie Master) and [Zombie Trailblazer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zombie Trailblazer) for targeted unblockability to finish off your opponent.
posts.html:
Excellent card a Scathe Zombie generator that targets both graveyards. Also another great addition to the Zombie beats play style and backed with Death Baron, Lord of the Undead, and Undead Warchief you have a fast and furious Zombie deck that can hold it own against almost any deck. Combine with Zombie Master and Zombie Trailblazer for targeted unblockability to finish off your opponent.
Report Abuse

posts.html:

posts.post_content: A great card. In case your opponent's rely on graveyard mills, you can take [Withered Wretch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Withered Wretch) out and make a Zombie instead. A 3/3 Zombie with the Reaper, and a permanent 2/2 Zombie without it.
posts.html:
